name: ESP32-GPT
description: This library enables ESP32 devices to communicate with OpenAI GPT models, generate text-to-speech audio, transcribe audio files, and perform speech-to-speech conversion via HTTP and WebSocket API calls. It includes features like conversation context management, model selection, callback-based responses, TTS/transcription/STT functionality for easy integration into Arduino projects.
keywords: esp32, openai, gpt, tts, transcription, sts, speech-to-speech, websocket
